label: Analytical Thinking

label: Process Improvement
desc: You streamline steps to make work faster, better, and cheaper.

label: Problem Solving
desc: You enjoy figuring out root causes and practical fixes.

label: Customer Empathy

label: Clear Communication
desc: You explain ideas clearly in writing and in conversation.

label: Data Visualization

desc: You can query databases to answer questions with data.

desc: You write simple scripts to automate tasks or analyze data.

label: Lean Six Sigma
desc: You use Lean/6σ ideas to reduce waste and defects.

label: Compliance & Risk
desc: You help work stay inside rules and manage risks.

desc: You understand IT controls and audit basics for SOX.

desc: You think about protecting data and systems from threats.

label: UX Design

desc: You write words that persuade and inform.

label: Sales Strategy

label: Account Management

label: Supply Chain

label: Quality Assurance

label: Reliability Testing
desc: You test for durability and consistent performance.

label: Systems Thinking

label: Cloud Infrastructure

label: API Integration

label: ETL Pipelines

label: Policy Analysis

label: Technical Writing

label: Automation / RPA
